base_description: Square, dark green soap dispenser with white pump.
part_description: Consists of a square base and a cylindrical white pump. The base is dark green and holds the liquid, while the pump is centered on top, used for dispensing.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism interacts with the liquid inside the base. When pressed, the pump creates suction that pulls the liquid up through a tube, dispensing it through the nozzle.
external_interaction_description: The dispenser interacts with users by providing soap when the pump is pressed. It can be placed on bathroom or kitchen counters, interacting with the environment as a functional and aesthetic item.
